title: LA-23-03: The Standards of Conduct and 18 U.S.C. § 208 as Applied to Official Social Media Use
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/EAE37A7DA3C38BF38525894700775339/$FILE/LA-23-03 The Standards of Conduct and 18 U.S.C. § 208 as Applied to Official Social Media Use.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory provides guidance on how the Federal ethics rules and conflict of interest statute at 18 U.S.C. § 208 apply to use of official social media accounts by executive branch employees.
